name: Jurassic Dark - Cute Dinosaur Dash on a Surfer Skateboard
name_original: Jurassic Dark - Cute Dinosaur Dash on a Surfer Skateboard
description:
Dinosaurs are alive! And they ride skateboards! This is crazy fun for all ages.

HOW TO PLAY:

Press the lower screen to jump your dinosaur. Jump over spiked turtles and pesky wasps with sharp stingers. Avoid fireballs. Collect gold and silver coins to unlock new characters.


EXCITING FUN AND ITS FREE TO DOWNLOAD!!!

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Jurassic Dark FREE’ Now!!!

PLEASE NOTE: This game is free to play but does charge real money for additional content. You may adjust your settings to lock out this function.
